function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of trust and transparency leading to public disengagement","Impact":"Public disengagement and lack of cooperation with pandemic prevention and response","Mitigation":"Promote trust and transparency in communication, address myths and misinformation, reject stigma and discrimination","Technologies":"Communication tools, social media platforms, reliable information sources","People":"General public","Owner":"Communication experts, public health officials"},{"Description":"Mental health issues leading to irrational behavior and social chaos","Impact":"Decreased mental peace, irrational behavior, social chaos, and jeopardized pandemic control efforts","Mitigation":"Address mental health concerns, reassure the public, promote social communication and stability","Technologies":"Telecommunication tools, web-based applications, social media platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Social and mental health experts"},{"Description":"Misuse of WhatsApp leading to circulation of fake news and misinformation","Impact":"Spread of misinformation, panic, and fear among the public","Mitigation":"Promote rational use of WhatsApp, discourage circulation of fake news, encourage access to reliable information sources","Technologies":"WhatsApp, reliable information sources","People":"General public","Owner":"Media literacy advocates, communication experts"}]}
